Straight Shot nodds and she looks to everyone.

" We may not be the richest=
 beings on this planet, but as Autobots we are the most generous.  If you p=
romise ta give us Rodimus, maybe we can give you something in return. "

Tu=
cson chimes in.

" She's right, we can offer you something.  It's freedom a=
nd sanctuary. But only if you agree to release Rodimus in our care.  Once y=
ou do that, you're free to live here undesturbed.  Freedom is the right of =
all Sentient beings, and it is also priceless.  And that is why we are offe=
ring it to you.  Your highness, as leader of the Autobots, I solemnly swear=
 to uphold my offer to you, if you are willing to do something for us in re=
turn."
